response.original_title: How do I check my Geek Squad membership
response.overview: To check your Geek Squad membership, sign in to your Best Buy account online or in the Best Buy app and review your subscriptions. You can also search your email for a Geek Squad or Best Buy confirmation. For quick help, call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 to speak with support and verify your status. If you’re unsure which plan you have, an agent can look it up using your phone number or email. For fast confirmation or renewal details, contact 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638. You may also visit a Best Buy store, or call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 anytime. For immediate assistance, dial 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638
response.title: How do I check my Geek Squad membership
